definitions.definition: The state of having gas , often smelly , trapped (and when released , frequently with noise) in the digestive system of a human and some other animals ; wind ; and when released, a flatus , a fart .
The release of such gas; breaking wind .

main_definition: The state of having gas , often smelly , trapped (and when released , frequently with noise) in the digestive system of a human and some other animals ; wind ; and when released, a flatus , a fart .
secondary_definitions: The release of such gas; breaking wind .
